title: Episode #46 - Tim Scott (EP of Hurt Bert), Trevor Dellecave, John Moore, & ME
description: In LA from Bali for a couple weeks, The Exec Producer of Hurt Bert, Tim Scott sits down w/ Trevor Dellecave (The Soup Investigates), John Moore (Joe Schmo) & me to talk about the making of HURT BERT, his time at BoDog.net, his move to make indonesian television, & how awesome Indonesian women are.
